'''Minecraft: Guide to Redstone''' is a guide that contains various [[redstone]] tips, community creations, and construction guides.

== Synopsis ==
{{Quote|Become a master engineer and create awesome contraptions with the official Minecraft Guide to Redstone.
Discover the uses of redstone components, learn how to make working circuits, then create clever builds using your new skills.
With insider info and tips from the experts at Mojang, this is the definitive guide to engineering in Minecraft.}}
